meanings.definition: A member of the common people, as distinguished from those of noble or aristocratic rank.
meanings.sent1: The roturiers gathered in the town square to discuss their concerns.
meanings.sent2: In the village, the roturiers worked hard in the fields to provide for their families.
meanings.sent3: The roturiers decided to have a picnic in the castle courtyard just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Among the roses of high society, the roturiers bloomed with their own unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The image of the roturiers dancing joyfully under the moonlight stayed in their memories forever.

meanings.definition: A person of low social status or rank.
meanings.sent1: Despite being a roturiers, he always carried himself with dignity and pride.
meanings.sent2: The roturiers in the neighborhood were known for their kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent3: The roturiers joked about starting their own exclusive club for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of elites, the roturiers stood out with their genuine smiles.
meanings.sent5: The story of the roturiers who rose to greatness inspired many others in similar situations.
